Reviews.Title: Two halcyon 1200 mah lithium Lon replacement battery and charger kit for
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The halcyon 1200 mah lithium Lon replacement battery and charger kit is very good for my camera . Now I do not waryThe camera battery die before my job comple.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery & 1 Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 1200 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Panasonic DMW-BCL7 Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 1200 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery and Charger Kit for Panasonic Lumix DMC-SZ3 Digital Camera and Panasonic DMW-BCL7
